emit¶

emit()

Emit a signal, returning the resulting SIG object.

Parameters:
  • $signal (signal) – Signal
  • $context (object) – Context signal
Return type:

object SIG

Example¶

Emitting a signal.

<?php
// Emit the foo signal
emit('foo');
